articles.title: Video: DOJ asking witnesses about their conversations with Trump, per Washington Post - CNN Video
articles.description: According to the Washington Post, Department of Justice investigators have asked grand jury witnesses about Trump's actions and conversations around January 6th. CNN's Elie Honig and Stephanie Grisham explain what this new report means.

articles.title: Video: See Ukrainian army use rockets given by US in Russian war - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Ivan Watson talks to Ukrainians who are preparing for more fighting against Russia in the southern region of the country.

articles.title: Trump's defense secretary denies there were orders to have 10K troops ready to deploy on January 6

articles.title: Trump pushes harsh criminal justice agenda in first DC speech since leaving office

articles.author: Manu Raju and Alex Rogers, CNN
articles.title: Trump's revenge tour over Michigan Republican's impeachment vote endangers a GOP House seat
articles.description: It was just three days into Republican Rep. Peter Meijer's term when a pro-Trump mob ransacked the Capitol. A week later, the freshman voted to impeach Trump.
articles.content:
Grand Rapids, Michigan (CNN)It was just three days into Republican Rep. Peter Meijer's term when a pro-Trump mob ransacked the Capitol. A week later, the freshman voted to impeach Trump. 
Now, that … [+10900 chars]

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Merrick Garland does not rule out charging Trump and others in January 6 probe
articles.description: Garland to NBC: "(W)e will hold accountable anyone who is criminally responsible for attempting to interfere with the legitimate, lawful transfer of power from one administration to the next."
articles.content: Washington (CNN)Attorney General Merrick Garland has declined to rule out prosecuting former President Donald Trump and others for their role in the January 6, 2021, attack on the US Capitol or attem… [+2438 chars]

articles.author: Kate Sullivan, CNN
articles.title: CNN Poll: 75% of Democratic voters want someone other than Biden in 2024
articles.description: A new CNN poll finds 75% of Democratic and Democratic-leaning voters want the party to nominate someone other than President Joe Biden in the 2024 election, a sharp increase from earlier this year.

articles.author: Joshua A. Douglas
articles.title: Opinion: One state where GOPers show the election wasn't stolen
articles.description: A Kentucky legislative panel held a recent hearing on election integrity. The message from those who testified: Kentucky's elections are secure. Joshua A. Douglas points out this is quite different from the national sentiment among many on the right.

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: The inside story of how John Roberts failed to save abortion rights
articles.description: It appears unlikely that Roberts' best prospect -- Justice Brett Kavanaugh -- was ever close to switching his earlier vote.
